title: The Agony of Jimmy Quinlan
creator_credit: Andy Thomson, Janice H Brown, Robert Duncan, Peter Katadotis and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Jimmy Quinlan is a derelict, one of some five thousand other men and women who have abandoned their jobs and families to live in the streets and alleys in Montreal. This film, a powerful portrayal of life on skid row, tells of his “agonies” - his attempt to get off the bottle. It’s something he’s tried before, and will probably have to try again. Award: New York
creator_credit_for_label: Andy Thomson, Janice H Brown, Robert Duncan, Peter Katadotis and National Film Board of Canada
